original_text: There was a small city and only a few people lived in it. A powerful king came to attack that city. His army made their camp around the city. They built heaps of earth all around it.
korean_text: 곧 작고 인구가 많지 아니한 어떤 성읍에 큰 왕이 와서 그것을 에워싸고 큰 흉벽을 쌓고 치고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: and only a few people lived in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 단 몇 사람만 살고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: A powerful king came to attack that city
sentences.korean_translation: 강력한 왕이 그 도시를 공격하러 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: His army made their camp around the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군대는 도시 주변에 진을 쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: They built heaps of earth all around it
